alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 2:22AM EDT until March 25 at 2:07PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Mill Creek at Evendale. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mill Creek at Evendale. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding occurs near the Sharon and Mosteller Road intersection, as well as along Canal Road. Flood waters begin to enter some businesses near the creek in Reading, Evendale and Sharonville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 13.6 feet. It will then fall below flood stage later Saturday. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
